newsitem.title: USA: Dow Industrials seen weak at open.
newsitem.headline: Dow Industrials seen weak at open.

text.p: The Dow Industrials were expected to open lower Thursday, following through on Wedneday's sell-off and little affected by news of the death of China's paramount leader Deng Xiaoping.

A Wall Street Journal report that Goldman Sachs strategist Abby Cohen was adjusting her bullish views may also have just a limited effect on trading as the comments were in fact faxed to clients last Friday, analysts said.
"The morning looks weak. Momentum late yesterday was downward," said Prudential Securities analyst Larry Wachtel.
